Streamlyne’s Custom Scenario Builder is a self-service tool that allows you to build relationships and scenarios between your sensors, assets, and user generated data.


Dashboard

This is the main landing area for operators and managers to see an instant snapshot of recent alerts, view scenarios, view custom reports, and to read or leave comments to communicate with operators and managers.

Alerts

Instantly be alerted when assets are reaching maximum or minimum thresholds, and see what other assets may be affected.

Streamlyne Scenario Builder

Simply build relationships (aka “links”) between sensors, assets, and user generated content to create your own monitoring system to understand when critical events happen before they happen.

Custom Reports

Create custom automated reports of scenarios for the people who need to know when things happen.

Comments

Leave and view comments by fellow operators so everyone is always on top of the latest developments and scenarios.
